verses.verse: Let me <S%H7891>sing<s%> for my well <S%H3039>beloved<s%> a <S%H7892>song<s%> of my <S%H1730>beloved<s%> about his <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%> My <S%H3039>beloved<s%> had a <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> on a very <S%H1121>fruitful<s%> <S%H7161>hill.<s%>

He <S%H5823>dug<s%> it <S%H5619>up,<s%> gathered out its stones, <S%H5193>planted<s%> it with the choicest <S%H8321>vine,<s%> <S%H1129>built<s%> a <S%H4026>tower<s%> in its <S%H8432>midst,<s%> and also <S%H2672>cut<s%> out a <S%H3342>winepress<s%> <S%H6960>therein.<s%> He looked for it to <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> but it <S%H6213>yielded<s%> wild <S%H891>grapes.<s%>
<S%H3427>"Now,<s%> inhabitants of <S%H3389>Jerusalem<s%> and <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah,<s%> please <S%H8199>judge<s%> between me and my <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

What could have been <S%H6213>done<s%> more to my <S%H3754>vineyard,<s%> that I have not <S%H6213>done<s%> in <S%H4069>it?<s%> Why, when I <S%H6960>looked<s%> for it to <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H6025>grapes,<s%> did it <S%H6213>yield<s%> wild <S%H891>grapes?<s%>

Now I will <S%H3045>tell<s%> you what I will <S%H6213>do<s%> to my <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%> I will take <S%H5493>away<s%> its <S%H4881>hedge,<s%> and it will be eaten <S%H1197>up.<s%> I will break <S%H6555>down<s%> its <S%H1447>wall<s%> of <S%H4823>it,<s%> and it will be trampled down.

I will <S%H7896>lay<s%> it a <S%H1326>wasteland.<s%> It <S%H2168>won't<s%> be pruned nor <S%H5737>hoed,<s%> but it will <S%H5927>grow<s%> <S%H8068>briers<s%> and <S%H7898>thorns.<s%> I will also <S%H6680>command<s%> the <S%H5645>clouds<s%> that they <S%H4305>rain<s%> no rain on <S%H4305>it.<s%>"

For the <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> and the <S%H376>men<s%> of <S%H3063>Judah<s%> his <S%H8191>pleasant<s%> <S%H5194>plant:<s%> and he <S%H6960>looked<s%> for <S%H4941>justice,<s%> <S%H4939>but,<s%> behold, oppression; for <S%H6666>righteousness,<s%> <S%H6818>but,<s%> behold, a cry of distress.

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H5060>join<s%> <S%H1004>house<s%> to <S%H1004>house,<s%> who <S%H7126>lay<s%> <S%H7704>field<s%> to <S%H7704>field,<s%> until there is <S%H657>no<s%> <S%H4725>room,<s%> and you are made to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> alone in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H776>land!<s%>

In my <S%H241>ears,<s%> <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> <S%H3808>says:<s%> "Surely <S%H7227>many<s%> <S%H1004>houses<s%> will be <S%H8047>desolate,<s%> even <S%H1419>great<s%> and <S%H2896>beautiful,<s%> <S%H3427>unoccupied.<s%>

<S%H3588>For<s%> <S%H6235>ten<s%> <S%H6776>acres<s%> of <S%H3754>vineyard<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> <S%H259>one<s%> <S%H1324>bath,<s%> and a <S%H2563>homer<s%> of <S%H2233>seed<s%> shall <S%H6213>yield<s%> an <S%H374>ephah.<s%>"

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who rise up <S%H7925>early<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning,<s%> that they may <S%H7291>follow<s%> strong <S%H7941>drink;<s%> who <S%H309>stay<s%> late into the <S%H5399>night,<s%> until <S%H3196>wine<s%> inflames <S%H1814>them!<s%>

The <S%H3658>harp,<s%> <S%H5035>lyre,<s%> <S%H8596>tambourine,<s%> and <S%H5035>flute,<s%> with <S%H3196>wine,<s%> are at their <S%H4960>feasts;<s%> but they <S%H5027>don't<s%> respect the <S%H6467>work<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh,<s%> neither have they <S%H7200>considered<s%> the <S%H6467>operation<s%> of his <S%H3027>hands.<s%>

Therefore my <S%H5971>people<s%> go into <S%H1540>captivity<s%> for lack of <S%H1847>knowledge.<s%> Their <S%H3519>honorable<s%> <S%H4962>men<s%> are <S%H7458>famished,<s%> and their <S%H1995>multitudes<s%> are <S%H6704>parched<s%> with <S%H6772>thirst.<s%>

Therefore <S%H7585>Sheol<s%> has <S%H7337>enlarged<s%> its <S%H6310>desire,<s%> and <S%H6473>opened<s%> its <S%H6310>mouth<s%> without <S%H2706>measure;<s%> and their <S%H1926>glory,<s%> their <S%H1995>multitude,<s%> their <S%H7588>pomp,<s%> and he who <S%H5938>rejoices<s%> among <S%H3381>them,<s%> descend into it.
So <S%H120>man<s%> is brought <S%H7817>low,<s%> <S%H120>mankind<s%> is <S%H8213>humbled,<s%> and the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1364>arrogant<s%> ones are <S%H8213>humbled;<s%>
but <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies<s%> is <S%H1361>exalted<s%> in <S%H4941>justice,<s%> and <S%H410>God<s%> the <S%H6918>Holy<s%> One is <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>
Then the <S%H3532>lambs<s%> will <S%H7462>graze<s%> as in their <S%H1699>pasture,<s%> and <S%H1481>strangers<s%> will <S%H398>eat<s%> the <S%H2723>ruins<s%> of the <S%H4220>rich.<s%>
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H4900>draw<s%> <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> with <S%H2256>cords<s%> of <S%H7723>falsehood,<s%> and <S%H2403>wickedness<s%> as with <S%H5699>cart<s%> <S%H5688>rope;<s%>

Who <S%H559>say,<s%> "Let him make <S%H4116>speed,<s%> let him <S%H2363>hasten<s%> his <S%H4639>work,<s%> that we may <S%H7200>see<s%> <S%H6098>it;<s%> and let the counsel of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> draw <S%H7126>near<s%> and <S%H935>come,<s%> that we may know <S%H3045>it!<s%>"

<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who <S%H559>call<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H2896>good,<s%> and <S%H2896>good<s%> <S%H7451>evil;<s%> who <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H2822>darkness<s%> for <S%H216>light,<s%> and <S%H216>light<s%> for <S%H2822>darkness;<s%> who <S%H7760>put<s%> <S%H4751>bitter<s%> for <S%H4966>sweet,<s%> and <S%H4966>sweet<s%> for <S%H4751>bitter!<s%>
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who are <S%H2450>wise<s%> in their own <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> and <S%H995>prudent<s%> in their own <S%H6440>sight!<s%>
<S%H1945>Woe<s%> to those who are <S%H1368>mighty<s%> to <S%H8354>drink<s%> <S%H3196>wine,<s%> <S%H582>and<s%> <S%H2428>champions<s%> at <S%H4537>mixing<s%> strong <S%H7941>drink;<s%>
who <S%H6663>acquit<s%> the <S%H7563>guilty<s%> <S%H6118>for<s%> a <S%H7810>bribe,<s%> but <S%H5493>deny<s%> <S%H6666>justice<s%> for the <S%H6662>innocent!<s%>

Therefore as the tongue of <S%H784>fire<s%> <S%H398>devours<s%> the <S%H7179>stubble,<s%> and as the dry <S%H2842>grass<s%> sinks <S%H7503>down<s%> in the <S%H3956>flame,<s%> so their <S%H8328>root<s%> shall be as <S%H4716>rottenness,<s%> and their <S%H6525>blossom<s%> shall go <S%H5927>up<s%> as <S%H80>dust;<s%> because they have <S%H3988>rejected<s%> the <S%H8451>law<s%> of <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%> of <S%H6635>Armies,<s%> and <S%H5006>despised<s%> the <S%H565>word<s%> of the Holy <S%H6918>One<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>

Therefore <S%H3068>Yahweh<s%>'s <S%H639>anger<s%> <S%H2734>burns<s%> against his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and he has stretched <S%H5186>out<s%> his <S%H3027>hand<s%> against <S%H5221>them,<s%> and has struck <S%H2022>them.<s%> The mountains <S%H7264>tremble,<s%> and their dead <S%H5038>bodies<s%> are as <S%H5478>refuse<s%> in the <S%H7130>midst<s%> of the <S%H2351>streets.<s%> For all <S%H639>this,<s%> his anger is not turned <S%H7725>away,<s%> but his <S%H3027>hand<s%> is still stretched <S%H5186>out.<s%>

He will lift <S%H5375>up<s%> a <S%H5251>banner<s%> to the <S%H1471>nations<s%> from <S%H7350>far,<s%> and he will <S%H8319>whistle<s%> for them from the <S%H7097>end<s%> of the <S%H776>earth.<s%> <S%H935>Behold,<s%> they will come <S%H4120>speedily<s%> and <S%H7031>swiftly.<s%>

None shall be <S%H5889>weary<s%> nor <S%H3782>stumble<s%> among <S%H5123>them;<s%> none shall slumber nor <S%H3462>sleep;<s%> neither shall the <S%H232>belt<s%> of their <S%H2504>waist<s%> be <S%H6605>untied,<s%> nor the <S%H8288>latchet<s%> of their <S%H5275>shoes<s%> be <S%H5423>broken:<s%>

whose <S%H2671>arrows<s%> are <S%H8150>sharp,<s%> and all their <S%H7198>bows<s%> <S%H1869>bent.<s%> Their <S%H5483>horses<s%>' <S%H6541>hoofs<s%> will be <S%H2803>like<s%> <S%H6862>flint,<s%> and their <S%H1534>wheels<s%> like a <S%H5492>whirlwind.<s%>

Their <S%H7581>roaring<s%> will be like a <S%H3833>lioness.<s%> They will <S%H7580>roar<s%> like young <S%H3715>lions.<s%> <S%H5098>Yes,<s%> they shall roar, and <S%H270>seize<s%> their <S%H2964>prey<s%> and carry it <S%H6403>off,<s%> and there will be no one to <S%H5337>deliver.<s%>

They will <S%H5098>roar<s%> against them in that <S%H3117>day<s%> like the <S%H5100>roaring<s%> of the <S%H3220>sea.<s%> If one <S%H5027>looks<s%> to the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H2822>behold,<s%> darkness and <S%H6862>distress.<s%> The <S%H216>light<s%> is <S%H2821>darkened<s%> in its <S%H6183>clouds.<s%>
